    How to Play

    To Play th Simply traverse through the different level mazes using rodger the alien
    As a reward you collect coins which rodger can use and are then streamed to you whenever you feel like you have had enough playtime The duration of the stream is determined by the time attached to each coin when you collect this is also shown at the top of the screen. You have a limited amount of time to complete a level maze so the coins you collect also add time to your exisiting level time which is carried over throughout all levels

    Binance Smart Chain

    To play the game you will need to ensure that you have setup metamask accordingly as stipulated on the Binance Website You will also need some test net eth to get the Amazeng tokens streamed to your account testnet eth for the Binance smartchain network is available here testnet faucet
    Ensure that you select the *Give me BNB option*
